definition: to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

pinyin: dian3 ji1 fu4 fei4 guang3 gao4

definition: number of clicks/number of hits (on a website)

sentences.english: When finished with the list, click OK then close out of Local Group Policy Editor.
sentences.chinese: 完成列表后，点击确定并关闭本地组策略编辑器。

sentences.english: She clicks on the link to the registration form and begins entering her information.
sentences.chinese: 她在登记表的连接处点击一下，开始进入她的信息。

sentences.english: Scroll down to read about the latest update, or just click here.
sentences.chinese: 滚动鼠标向下，阅读最新的更新，或者点击这里。

sentences.english: You can use the “source” links to read more on each battle.
sentences.chinese: 你可以点击“来源”链接，阅读这些战争的更多内容。

sentences.english: Gather as much money as you can by clicking on the coins.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能多地点击硬币来捡钱。

sentences.english: Click here for the full Road Trip 2009 package.
sentences.chinese: 点击这里2009年全路之旅包。

sentences.english: Now she is named as the Top Ten Star of 2010 by Top Hits.
sentences.chinese: 现在，她被命名为2010年十大明星的热门点击。

sentences.english: Stroke the cat to make it purr then click on the Cinderella.
sentences.chinese: 点击这个猫使它发声音，然后点灰姑娘。

sentences.english: And god help the user who clicks on an intersection.
sentences.chinese: 还有，如果用户点击交叉口的话，系统也无能为力。

sentences.english: Clik here to download and install the player.
sentences.chinese: 点击这里下载并安装相应播放器。

sentences.english: By going low-level, you can play back the individual components of a mouse click.
sentences.chinese: 通过进入低级，您可以回放一个鼠标点击分解动作。

sentences.english: Enter POL in the media code box and click the Verify button.
sentences.chinese: 输入油料在媒体上的代码框，并点击验证按钮。

sentences.english: If you’d rather not miss out, click here to buy the EBK now.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不想错过这次机会，请点击这里订购。

sentences.english: But click it, you can discover to there is off-the-peg answer on the webpage.
sentences.chinese: 但点击它，你会发现网页上并没有现成的答案。

sentences.english: Click here to learn more about the N5 Comfort features.
sentences.chinese: 点击这里了解更多关于N5的舒适功能。

sentences.english: You can access by just push the sharp button right here on the main menu.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过点击这个在主菜单上尖形按钮。

definition: to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
